properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 11:56AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Woodbury

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Warren.

.Heavy rain on Wednesday falling over already saturated grounds will cause
the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Woodbury.
* from this afternoon until further notice.
* At 11:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 24.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late this afternoon and
continue to rise to near 35.5 feet by Friday morning.
* Impact...At 36.0 feet...Many parts of Woodbury flood.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.7
feet on Apr 29 2011.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
